resources.string:
Across Quindío will let you know one of the most visit department of Colombia. "Go through Quindío is easy, pleasant
and fun..."
Visit Panaca and spend some family time and more...\n
Visit the Parque Nacional del café and ride The Krater and more...\n
Walk for the trails through the Parque del Café and more...\n

Welcome!
Here, you find useful information about Armenia, Quindío
(Colombia)...
¿Are you looking for some place to spend the night?
\nThe hotel with the best location in the downtown of Armenia. 19 modern room with private bathroom, WiFi and cable Tv.\n

Located in the town of Montenegro, let us to know the traditions and coffee culture. Among its attractions are: the monument to coffee, ecological tour, Krater roller coaster, horses, garden fables, heliport, paisa people and train ride, among others.

Write us:servicioalcliente@parquedelcafe.co
Call us: PBX (6) – 7417417
sunday to sunday de 8am – 6pm
WEB: http://www.parquedelcafe.co/
Address: Km 6 vía Montenegro Pueblo Tapao Quindío – Colombia

Quindio department is located in the west-central region of the country and is part of El Eje Cafetero; it is known for its beautiful scenery of green mountains decorated by coffee plantations and lush plants. Quindio is proudly cradle of Colombian national tree: La Palma de Cera\n
The population, mostly mestizo, stemmed from indigenous groups mix with Spaniards. Colonization of Antioquia, in the early nineteenth century, just as marked characteristics in the population.

Quindío Department has 543.532 people, which the 87%% lives in urban headers and the 13%% in rural areas. The residents of Quindió are called Quindiano and the people who lives in Armenia, the capital, are called Cuyabros.

Across Quindío App

string-array.name: List_Accom_Desc
string-array.item: The hotel with the best location in the downtown of Armenia. 19 modern room with private bathroom, WiFi and cable Tv.\n
Find a good place to drink something, meet people and listen music.The real all inclusive, now in the Eje Cafetero. Spectacular hotel with rustic architecture inside the Panaca thematic park.\n
Spectacular hotel build using typical elements of the region and with the highest quality standards in the Eje Cafetero.\n

string-array.name: List_Tour_name
string-array.item: PANACA - Parque Nacional de la Cultura Agropecuaria

string-array.name: List_Tour_Desc1
string-array.item: It is a big theme park where you can enjoy the full beauty of life in the countryside. Among other attractions enjoy the amazing world of livestock, fascinating world of the poultry farming, sensational world of the pig, the friendly dog world, the curious world of sericulture, the new world of biorganics, the spectacular world of horses and the interesting world of agronomy.

Located in the town of Montenegro, let us to know the traditions and coffee culture. Among its attractions are: the monument to coffee, ecological tour, Krater roller coaster, horses, garden fables, heliport, paisa people and train ride, among others.

Offers the most diverse variety of flora and fauna typical of the cloud forest, in the valley of Cocora find large concentrations of Quindío wax palm, plant his majesty was named national tree. In this region there are also the natural reserves of Acaime and Herencia Verde.
Located in the Municipality of Cordoba, it is the ideal place to meet the various uses of bamboo and bamboo site.
National Architecture Prize, designed by architect Rogelio Salmona, houses one of the most complete collections of pre-Columbian art.
